short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate your General Weighted Average (GWA) for Philippine grading system

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The GWA (General Weighted Average) Calculator is a Chrome extension tailored for students in the Philippines. This user-friendly tool simplifies the process of calculating your GWA based on the standard Philippine grading system.
Key Features:

Intuitive interface for easy course input
Supports grades from 1.0 to 5.0
Handles multiple courses with varying unit weights
Instant GWA calculation
Works offline for privacy and convenience

How to Use:

Click the extension icon
Enter course names, units, and grades
Add more courses as needed
Click "Calculate GWA" for instant results

Benefits:

Time-saving: Eliminates manual calculations
Accurate: Reduces human error in GWA computation
Convenient: Always accessible in your browser
Private: All calculations performed locally

Perfect for college students, academic advisors, and anyone needing to calculate GWA in the Philippine education system. This lightweight extension offers a straightforward solution for academic performance tracking.
Future plans include options to save semester data, export functionality, and a dark mode. Whether you're planning your academic journey or keeping track of your grades, the GWA Calculator Extension serves as your personal academic assistant, right in your Chrome browser.
Simplify your GWA calculations and focus on what really matters â€“ your studies!
